title: What salary would I need to live comfortably in Marseille? - Quora
tags: Visiting and Travel in Marseille, France

response.answer_text: French gross median salary is 2300 €/month. For a long term contract that is a net salary (on your account after taxes) of 1677 €. I imagine that you will want a two bedrooms recent flat with a see view and a large balcony (who would not ?). Such a flat can reach 800 €/month depending on the area. After I let you do the math according to what you consider “comfortable”. It is more about you… do you plan to travel a lot ? do you like expensive restaurants ? Yes there is an Apple store in Marseille and the basic iPhone 11 is at 809 €. (Minimum Salary is called SMIC. Most jobs without qualification provide this salary. It is 1522 Gross = 1183 Net.) At this salary let say that Comfort and See view is hard to get…. as a reference A BigMac Menu in MacDonald is 7,40 € Hopefully most of pleasures in Marseille are priceless:  Source : random google search of Calanques view
